name: api_physics2d_RaycastHit2D
description: Returns information about 2D Colliders detected by a 2D physics query in the scene.

properties.name: centroid
properties.description: The world space centroid (center) of the physics query shape when it intersects.

properties.name: collider
properties.description: The Collider2D detected by the physics query.

properties.name: distance
properties.description: The distance the physics query traversed before it detected a Collider2D.

properties.name: fraction
properties.description: The fraction of the distance specified to the physics query before it detected a Collider2D.

properties.name: normal
properties.description: The surface normal of the detected Collider2D.

properties.name: point
properties.description: The world space position where the physics query shape intersected with the detected Collider2D surface.

properties.name: rigidbody
properties.description: The Rigidbody2D that the Collider2D detected by the physics query is attached to.

properties.name: transform
properties.description: The Transform on the GameObject that the Collider2D is attached to.
